!Centurion Nakusin: I will recite the names of representatives that you have to meet. Listen carefully. I will not repeat this. Do you understand? Meet *Tataru Zu Hestui* of the dignified Hestui tribe! Meet *Atuba Chief Varkees* of the cold-hearted Atuba tribe! Meet *Warehouse Keeper Grookin* of the persistent Neruga tribe! Meet *Gantaki Zu Urutu* of the strong-willed Urutu tribe! Meet *Trader Kunai* of the resourceful Duda-Mara tribe! Meet *Trader Uska* of the merciless Gandi tribe! Receive all the gifts they offer to the lord and bring them back to me!
